content.text:
Karen L. Haas, Clerk of the House, reported that on November 8, 2017, 
she presented to the President of the United States, for his approval, 
the following bill:

       H.R. 3031. To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide 
     for flexibility in making withdrawals from a Thrift Savings 
     Plan account, and for other purposes.
content.speaker: Unknown
